view.template:
{% load view_tags %} {% get_set 'project/partner' as partners %} {% get_set 'project/dataset' as datasets %}

DMPonline Template

Data Collection

What data will you collect or create?

{% for dataset in datasets %}

Dataset {% render_set_value dataset 'project/dataset/id' %}: {% render_set_value dataset 'project/dataset/description' %}, data format: {% render_set_value dataset 'project/dataset/format' %}

{% endfor %}

How will the data be collected or created?

{% for dataset in datasets %}

Dataset {% render_set_value dataset 'project/dataset/id' %}: {% render_set_value dataset 'project/dataset/creation_methods' %}

{% endfor %}

Documentation and Metadata

What documentation and metadata will accompany the data?

Metadata

{% for dataset in datasets %}

Dataset {% render_set_value dataset 'project/dataset/id' %}: {% render_set_value dataset 'project/dataset/interoperability' %}

{% endfor %}

Documentation

{% for dataset in datasets %}

Dataset {% render_set_value dataset 'project/dataset/id' %}: {% render_set_value dataset 'project/dataset/id/standards' %}

{% endfor %}

Ethics and Legal Compliance

How will you manage any ethical issues?

{% render_value 'project/legal_aspects/sensitive_data/other/yesno' %} {% render_value 'project/legal_aspects/sensitive_data/other/description' %}

How will you manage copyright and Intellectual Property Rights (IPR) issues?

{% for dataset in datasets %}

Dataset {% render_set_value dataset 'project/dataset/id' %}:

Applicable copyrights: {% render_set_value dataset 'project/dataset/ipr/copyrights' %}

Other applicable intellectual property rights: {% render_set_value dataset 'project/dataset/ipr/other_rights' %}

Rightsholder: {% render_set_value dataset 'project/dataset/ipr/owner/name' %}

{% endfor %}

Storage and Backup

How will the data be stored and backed up during the research?

{% for dataset in datasets %}

Dataset {% render_set_value dataset 'project/dataset/id' %}: {% render_set_value dataset 'project/dataset/storage/type' %}

{% endfor %}

How will you manage access and security?

{% render_value 'project/dataset/data_security' %}

Selection and Preservation

Which data are of long-term value and should be retained, shared, and/or preserved?

{% for dataset in datasets %}

Dataset {% render_set_value dataset 'project/dataset/id' %}: {% render_set_value dataset 'project/dataset/preservation/yesno' %}. {% render_set_value_inline_list dataset 'project/dataset/preservation/purpose' %}.

{% endfor %}

What is the long-term preservation plan for the dataset?

{% for dataset in datasets %}

Dataset {% render_set_value dataset 'project/dataset/id' %}: {% render_set_value dataset 'project/dataset/preservation/duration' %}. In: {% render_set_value dataset 'project/dataset/preservation/repository' %}

{% endfor %}

Data Sharing

How will you share the data?

{% for dataset in datasets %}

Dataset {% render_set_value dataset 'project/dataset/id' %}: {% render_set_value dataset 'project/dataset/metadata/standards' %}

{% endfor %}

Are any restrictions on data sharing required?

{% for dataset in datasets %}

Dataset {% render_set_value dataset 'project/dataset/id' %}: {% render_set_value dataset 'project/dataset/sharing/conditions' %}

{% endfor %}

Responsibilities and Resources

Who will be responsible for data management?

{% for dataset in datasets %}

Dataset {% render_set_value dataset 'project/dataset/id' %}:

Responsible person for the backups: {% render_set_value dataset 'project/dataset/backup_responsible/name' %}

Responsible person for documenting the metadata and context information: {% render_set_value dataset 'project/dataset/metadata/responsible_person/name' %}

Responsible person for the maintenance of the PIDs and the object maintenance: {% render_set_value dataset 'project/dataset/pids/responsible_person/name' %}

{% endfor %}

Person(s) who choose(s) the data to be archived: {% render_value_inline_list 'project/preservation/responsible_person/name' %}

What resources will you require to deliver your plan?

Metadata costs

Personnel: {% render_value 'project/costs/metadata/personnel' %}

Other: {% render_value 'project/costs/metadata/non_personnel' %}

Preservation costs

Personnel: {% render_value 'project/costs/preservation/personnel' %}

Other: {% render_value 'project/costs/preservation/non_personnel' %}

Data sizes

{% for dataset in datasets %}

Dataset {% render_set_value dataset 'project/dataset/id' %}: {% render_set_value dataset 'project/dataset/id/volume' %}

{% endfor %}
